github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Fixed slow Lambda function response times and optimized DynamoDB queries.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Learned that inefficient DynamoDB queries were a major bottleneck.  Need better indexing strategy.
github_commits.bug_related: This directly addresses the performance issues and the need for improved log retention to assist with compliance audits.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added caching layer to reduce Lambda invocations.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Caching significantly improved response times, but needs monitoring to prevent excessive memory usage.
github_commits.bug_related: Helps with the performance, and the increased logging will be valuable for the compliance audit.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Performance issues - S3 & Lambda

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Performance issues pe kaam karna hai!  S3 aur Lambda mein problem hai, bata raha hoon.

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Lambda function mein delay hai.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and the Lambda logs.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  Customers ko irritate hoga.

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Code ka beta testing karenge.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: I've added caching, seems to be helping a bit.  Still need to investigate the S3 latency.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decided to focus on Lambda function optimization and S3 latency.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning:  Old logs might be missing key information for compliance audits.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Someone mentioned needing to check old logs for compliance.

jira_tickets.title: Optimize Lambda Function Performance & Log Retention
jira_tickets.description: Investigate and resolve performance bottlenecks in the Lambda functions. Implement a better strategy for log retention to facilitate compliance audit requests.  Need to ensure sufficient log data is available.
comments: Initial investigation shows slow response times.
Adding caching layer to Lambda function.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Directly related to the performance issues and the need for accurate historical logs for compliance audits.

confluence_docs.title: Performance Optimization - Sprint 4
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content detailing the performance optimization strategy, including Lambda function tuning, S3 access patterns, and log retention policies.  Emphasis on collecting sufficient data for compliance audits.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel

google_docs.title: Sprint 4 Planning - Performance & Compliance
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the sprint planning meeting, outlining tasks, timelines, and key decisions.  Included a discussion about the importance of log retention for compliance.
action_items: Arjun to investigate Lambda function performance.
google_docs.bug_mentions: Specifically referenced the need to ensure adequate log data is available for compliance audits.
